name: Asylum: Room Escape
description:
Welcome to Asylum!

This spooky escape game takes you to grisly asylum. Your goal in this terrifying situation is to search hints, solve puzzles and do whatever it takes to find your way to escape. Before it's too late...

Playing the game with Google Cardboard or any other VR device gives you a totally new meaning for room escape games.

Game features:

VR CARDBOARD
Step into the new era of escape games.

NORMAL MODE
Enjoy classical room escape game!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Amazing 3D graphics providing really creepy atmosphere.

INNOVATIVE PUZZLES
Tricky yet logical puzzles you have never solved before.

Download this awesome room escape game now and try out the first room for free!
